content: "As the primary platform for booking appointments to renew passports and obtain national and foreign IDs, the Cita Previa website serves a diverse range of users including residents, citizens, and foreigners in Spain. With the added challenges of the COVID-19 pandemic, it is more important than ever to provide a streamlined and efficient digital-first experience for all users. Our goal with this redesign is to improve the process and serve as a main entry point for accessing other services, meeting the needs of our diverse target audience."
